sourcesContent:
import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { Col, Row } from "react-bootstrap" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import phonesService from "../../services/phones.services" const DetailPage = () => { const [phone, setPhone] = useState([]) const { id } = useParams() useEffect(() => { getPhone(id) }, [phone]) const getPhone = (id) => { phonesService .getOne(id) .then(res => setPhone(res.data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } return ( <>

Details of {phone.name}

{phone.manufacturer}

{phone.description}

{phone.processor}

{phone.price}â‚¬ {phone.color}

 ) } export default DetailPage
